docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Leave a pendulum to its own devices and it most assuredly will swing the other way. So it has been lately with a theory of health and healing that treats the mind as a weapon at least as powerful as the best of modern medicaments. After nearly a century stuck on the side of the body, the pendulum has recently cut a wide arc toward the mind.

headline.main: MIND OVER DISEASE: CAN HAPPY THOUGHTS HEAL?

headline.main: Our Science Priorities Need More Scrutiny
